title: Two more flights carrying relief goods from UAE arrive
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 06 (APP): In continuation of humanitarian air bridge established between Pakistan and the United Arab Emirates, two more relief flights from the UAE arrived at Nur Khan Airbase, Rawalpindi.
In total, 18 flights from the UAE have landed in Pakistan carrying food, medical supplies and tents etc, said a news release on Tuesday.
“Pakistan is thankful to the government and the people of UAE for showing support and solidarity in these times of grave crisis,” the news release added.
